description: To ensure the Microsoft Edge browser is up to date and secure, users can easily check the version of their browser. This can be done by clicking on the three dots in the top right corner of the Edge window, selecting 'Help and Feedback', and then clicking on 'About Microsoft Edge'. This will display the current version of Microsoft Edge, which helps users identify if they have the latest updates addressing any vulnerabilities, such as CVE-2023-5478.
